titleStmt.title: A brief, but most true relation of the late barbarous and bloody plot of the negro's [sic] in the island of Barbado's [sic] on Friday the 21. of October, 1692. To kill the governour and all the planters, and to destroy the government there established, and to set up a new governour and government of their own. In a letter to a friend
titleStmt.author: Bohun, Edmund, 1645-1699.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for George Croom, in Thames-street,

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: January 18th. This may be printed Edmund Bohun.
Reproduction of original in the Newberry Library.
